text: It's not on Pres Trump's schedule, but if he's in the mood, he might be dropping  by the fundraiser being held tonight at Mar-a-Lago by the Republican Party of Palm Beach. But there's no press coverage.
author: markknoller

text: This event wasn't on @POTUS or @VP press schedule on Thursday, but WH tonight posted photo of them with guests in recognition of World Down Syndrome Day. (Official White House Photo by Tia Dufour)
author: markknoller

text: Six House Committee Chairs, Democrats all, issue joint statement calling on Atty Gen Barr to make entire Mueller report public "without delay."
author: markknoller

text: Goes without saying, all the network evening newscasts leading tonight with completion of the Mueller investigation and report submitted to the Attorney General.
author: markknoller

text: Office of Special Counsel Mueller shutting down. Spokesman says Mueller "will be concluding his service in the coming days. A small number of staff will remain to assist in closing the operations of the office for a period of time.
author: markknoller

text: Press lid at Mar-a-Lago. That means no further presidential appearances today. No chance to ask him about submission of  Mueller report and what it means.
author: markknoller

text: In written statement, @senatemajldr welcomes completion of Mueller investigation. Says he "sincerely" hopes Atty Gen Barr will provide as much information on the report "as soon as he can and with as much openness and transparency as possible."
author: markknoller

text: In joint written statement, @SpeakerPelosi and @SenSchumer say it's "imperative: that AG make the full Mueller report public. They says @POTUS and his lawyers/staff must not get "any 'sneak preview/'" "The watchword is transparency," they say.
author: markknoller

text: First WH response to notification on Mueller Report:
author: markknoller

text: @USTreasury announces new sanctions on Venezuelan banks "in response to illegal arrest" of aide to opposition leader/interim president Juan Guaido.
author: markknoller

text: At 2nd photo op with Caribbean leaders, @POTUS says they'll be discussing trade matters and "Venezuela may come up in our conversation." He said they'll discuss ways their nations "can be beneficial to each other."
author: markknoller

text: Pres and Mrs Trump have photo op with Caribbean leaders in front of Mar-a-Labo Club entrance. Pres thanks his guests for coming. Says they'll be having "some very important discussions."
author: markknoller

text:
Caribbean Leaders meeting today with Pres Trump:
-Pres Danilo Medina Sánchez of the Dominican Republic
-Pres Jovenel Moïse of Haiti
-Prime Minister Andrew Holness of Jamaica
-Prime Minsiter Allen Michael Chastanet of Saint Lucia
-Prime Minister Hubert A. Minnis of The Bahamas
author: markknoller

text: Pres blocks additional US sanctions on North Korea. @PressSec explains: “President Trump likes Chairman Kim and he doesn’t think these sanctions will be necessary.”
author: markknoller

text: .@USTreasury lowers penalty threshold to 80% for underpayment of withholding and estimate tax payments during 2018. Was urged by members of Congress on behalf of taxpayers who didn't adjust withholding after tax cuts went into affect.
author: markknoller

text: Asked if he'll be nominating Acting DefSec Patrick Shanahan to be permanent Secretary, @POTUS called him "a great guy," said he was on the flight to West Palm, and "we'll see what happens.
author: markknoller

text: Pres Trump also told reporters he'll be nominating conservative economic policy analyst Stephen Moore to be a member of the Federal Reserve Board. Moore is a founder and former president of the @club4growth. Also served on @WSJ editorial board and chief economist at @Heritage.
author: markknoller

text: On the tarmac at @PBI_Airport, Pres Trump approached press pool to spotlight the maps showing elimination of ISIS caliphate in Syria (bottom), compared to ISIS territory in 2014 (highlighted in red)(top). Gave maps to the press pool, telling them to "spread it around."
author: markknoller

text: .@PressSec says the territorial ISIS caliphate has been 100% eliminated in Syria and provided update version of the before and after maps @POTUS displayed on Wednesday.
author: markknoller

text: Pres steps off Air Force One on arrival in West Palm Beach, waves to cheering supporters on tarmac, and walks over to shake hands.
author: markknoller

text: Federal Reserve posts annual financial statement. Total assets at the end of 2018 approx $4.1-trillion, down $392-billion from previous year. 2018 earnings approx $63.1-billion, a decrease of $17.6-billion from 2017. A lot of money.
author: markknoller

text: Air Force One comes in for a landing at @PBI_Airport.
author: markknoller

text: Democratic Congressman says Pres Trump wrong about Dems, Jews and Israel.
author: markknoller

text: With Lebanese Foreign Minister, @SecPompeo denounces Hezbollah and says the Lebanese people "should no longer be made to suffer for the political and military ambitions" of Hezbollah and Iran. Tells Lebanon, "you will continue to have a friend in the United States.”
author: markknoller

text: BYA: A search my daily activity log of Pres Trump found 200 references to "collusion" since he took office, but that number only scrapes the surface. There were many times he said it that I didn't enter it it into my database.
author: markknoller

text: Pres Trump again said he has "no idea" when the Mueller report will be submitted. Asked if he thinks Mueller is dishonest, "Well, we're gonna see what happens. It's gonna be very interesting." Repeats for umpteenth time, "there was no collusion."
author: markknoller

text: Asked about advisor and son-in-law Jared Kushner using private app for Government e-mail, @POTUS said, "I know nothing about it. I've never heard that. I've never heard about it."
author: markknoller

text: Before answering some press questions on the South Lawn driveway, Pres worked ropeline of visitors invited to watch his departure on Marine One. Gives a wave before boarding.
author: markknoller

text: Air Force One wheels up from @Andrews_JBA en route West Palm Beach and his Mar-a-Lago estate, where today he hosts a summit with a number of Caribbean leaders. Also says he'll be working this weekend on China trade negotiations.
author: markknoller

text: Asked about House Democrats investigations of his Administration, @POTUS calls it "a continuation of the same witch hunt. "They know it. And behind closed doors they laugh at it." Says they should go to work on infrastructure legislation and other things.
author: markknoller

text: "The Democrats have very much proven to be anti-Israel," said Pres Trump, asked about Dems and himself not attending the @AIPAC Conference. "They are totally anti-Israel," calling it "a disgrace." He says,"frankly, I think they’re anti-Jewish."
author: markknoller

text: Today at the WH: Pres Trump leaves this morning for his Mar-a-Lago resort in Palm Beach to host a Caribbean Summit with leaders of The Bahamas, Dominican Republic, Haiti, Jamaica and Saint Lucia. Agenda includes the situation in  Venezuela, also the regional economy & security.
author: markknoller

text: "I’d love to have Biden.  I’d love to have Bernie, I’d love to have Beto," says @POTUS, asked on @FoxBusiness who he'd like to run against in 2020. "The press seems to have chosen Beto." By my count, out of 158 interviews, he's done 47 on Fox. ABC 3, CBS 5, CNN 0, NBC/CNBC 5
author: markknoller

text: Pres denies his decision to recognize Israeli sovereignty over the Golan Heights had anything to do with @netanyahu's bid for reelection. "No...I hear he’s doing OK...I hear he’s doing OK," Pres said on @MariaBartiromo. Expects PM's opponents support same decision on Golan,
author: markknoller

text: Academic group posts criticism of @POTUS Exec Order on manipulating college policies. Calls it "troubling," and "spearheaded by far right-wing organizations."
author: markknoller

text: On Friday, Pres Trump leaves for his Mar-a-Lago resort, where he'll be hosting a US/Caribbean Summit with the leaders of Bahamas, Dominican Republic, Haiti, Jamaica and Saint Lucia. Agenda includes the situation in Venezuela along with regional security & energy investment.
author: markknoller

text: Leading the network evening newscasts: CBS/ABC: Growing investigation of Boeing 737 MAX aircraft; NBC: Growing anticipation of Mueller report.
author: markknoller

text: It provides for Agencies to withhold Federal grants to influence college policy on freedom of speech and transparency issues on campus.
author: markknoller

text: WH posts text of Executive Order on transparency and freedom of speech on college campuses.
author: markknoller

text: Addressing personnel at the @ICEgov Field Office in Atlanta, @VP delivered a familiar speech in support of immigration enforcement. "We have a crisis on our southern border." "Walls work - and we're going to build that wall." "Be assured the American people are with you."
author: markknoller

text: As college students look on, Pres signs and displays Executive Order to expand free speech and accountability on college campuses. He says his Administration will not stand by idly and let colleges violate the First Amendment.
author: markknoller

text: Pres says his Executive Order directs Federal agencies to use educational and research grants to make sure colleges protect first amendment rights of their students - or "risk losing billions of taxpayer dollars."
author: markknoller

text: Sharing the stage with current and former college students, Pres Trump congratulates them for standing up against intimidation and pressure on college campuses. "I'm with you all the way," he says of protecting free speech in academia.
author: markknoller

text: WH fills East Room with guests invited to signing ceremony for Executive Order to expand free speech on college campuses by using Federal grants to influence college policies.
author: markknoller

text: Pres Trump issues disaster declaration for Nebraska, providing Federal assistance to areas hard-hit by severe winter storms, winds and flooding that began March 9.
author: markknoller

text: The @POTUS decision on the Golan Heights, also serves to give @netanyahu a boost in his tough campaign for reelection next month.
author: markknoller

text: Hugging @SecPompeo and then grasping his hand, PM @netanyahu says, "Thank you, America," for @POTUS decision on the Golan Heights
author: markknoller

text: .@SecPompeo said that as a cadet at West Point he studied the battles of the Golan Heights during the Yom Kippur War, and that Pres Trump's "bold decision" to recognize Israeli sovereignty over Golan makes the Israeli lives lost there "meaningful for all time."
author: markknoller

text: .@USTreasury announces sanctions against 2 China-based shipping companies for helping North Korea evade sanctions. Statement says it spotlights "the deceptive methods that the North Korean regime uses to circumvent international and U.S. sanctions."
author: markknoller

text: .@Netanyahu says he called @POTUS to thank him for the announcement on Israeli sovereignty over the Golan Heights. The PM said "there is no greater friendship" than that between the US and Israel.
author: markknoller

text: PM @netanyahu notes that @POTUS announcement about the Golan Heights comes on the eve of Purim, the Jewish holiday that celebrates the rescue of the Jewish People from Haman in ancient Persia. @netanyahu says "we are deeply grateful for US support."
author: markknoller

text: Before dinner with @SecPompeo, Prime Minister @netanyahu says Pres Trump again "made history" by recognizing Israeli sovereignty over the Golan Heights. The message he gives is that “America stands by Israel," says the PM. Calls US support "unbelievable" & "unmatchable."
author: markknoller

text: .@VP arrives at @Andrews_JBA and boards Air Force Two for flight to Atlanta to visit @ICEgov field office to receive briefing and address immigration and customs personnel. He later attends reelection fundraiser for @sendavidperdue.
author: markknoller

text: Netanyahu thanks @POTUS for Golan announcement.
author: markknoller

text: With @SecPompeo in Israel, @POTUS announces new US policy on Golan Heights.
author: markknoller

text: Pres meeting privately with the @BizRoundtable at its meeting on the 1st Quarter economic conditions. WH says the president's "business friendly agenda" is boosting the economy helping companies "to unleash their full potential." But no press coverage.
author: markknoller

text: .@netanyahu, @SecPompeo and @USAmbIsrael also visit recently built synagogue beneath the Western Wall. Opened December 2017 over the objections of Palestinians.
author: markknoller

text: By visiting the Western Wall with @netanyahu, @SecPompeo is seen to be offering a show of support for Israeli control of the Holy Site, contested by Palestinians. Pres Trump visited the Wall in May 2017, but not with Netanyahu.
author: markknoller

text: Prime Minister @netanyahu accompanies @SecPompeo on visit to the Western Wall and watches as Pompeo places written prayer in the wall.
author: markknoller

text: In old city of Jerusalem, @SecPompeo and wife Susan are welcomed on arrival at the Church of the Holy Sepulchre.
author: markknoller

text: Today at the WH: @POTUS signs Executive Order on expanding free speech and transparency on college campuses. But no transparency when @POTUS discusses the economy today with the Business Roundtable. It's closed to press.
author: markknoller

text: WH could use them in the Cabinet. Secretary Batman?
author: markknoller

text: Good catch. Corrected.
author: markknoller

text: Meant #NTABP.
author: markknoller

text: THey don't fly Marine One in that kind of weather.
author: markknoller

text: Pres Trump waves to shouting press, but waves off their questions as he walks into the WH.
author: markknoller

text: Never tire of the WH night landings of Marine One with the Monuments in the background. @NTABP
author: markknoller

text: .@POTUS steps off Air Force One after flight back to @Andrews_JBA from Canton, OH.
author: markknoller

text: Leading the network evening newscasts: CBS: FBI joins probe of 737-MAX aircraft; ABC: Nor'easter set to hit; NBC: Pres targets John McCain again.
author: markknoller

text: Pres issues statement of greetings to those observing Nowruz, the Iranian/Persian New Year: "In solidarity with the people of Iran, who yearn for a future of liberty, opportunity, and prosperity, the United States of America continues to condemn the dictatorial Iranian regime."
author: markknoller

text: Pres Trump at Brookside Country Club in Canton, OH attended 2 fundraising events for the RNC and his presidential campaign. Both closed to press coverage. Tickets range from $2,800/single to $70,000 per couple that includes a photo with @POTUS and dinner.
author: markknoller

text: On arrival in Canton, OH., Pres boarded limo, but after it rolled a few feet, stepped out to shake hands with supporters on the tarmac, before heading to Country Club for 2 campaign/RNC fundraising events.
author: markknoller

text: Pres Trump's speech at the tank plant had the sound, feel and music of one of his campaign rallies. Began with "God Bless the USA," and ended with "Can't Always Get What You Want." He thanked tank workers. "You don't know how to lose and will never have to find out."
author: markknoller

text: Pres also hails job numbers up almost 6-million since his election, including almost 600K manufacturing jobs. “If it weren’t for me, this place would have been closed," he says of the Lima Army Tank Plant. "And you’re doing us a favor," he tells plant workers.
author: markknoller

text: Pres trumpets new budget to increase defense spending to $750-billion next year. Says Lima tank plant workers will be giving US warriors the best legal tanks in history. Asks facetiously how US tanks compare with those made by Russia or China. "We will win, win, win," he says.
author: markknoller

text: Pres Trump again brought up his feelings about the late Sen. John McCain. Said he never liked McCain, "probably never will," citing his vote against legislation to repeal and replace ObamaCare. Said he approved big funeral for McCain, but doesn't have to be asked about him again.
author: markknoller

text: Pres Trump tells tank plant workers that he wanted to get into one of Abrams tanks they build, but they he remembered how that stunt worked out for 1988 Democratic Presidential Candidate Mike Dukakis. "The helmet was bigger than he was,” said @POTUS.
author: markknoller

text: Pres Trump again displays maps that show ISIS caliphate in Syria in Nov 2016 and now. Only a tiny spot left, he says. "The caliphate is gone as of tonight. That’s pretty good, right," he tells Tank Plant personnel.
author: markknoller

text: Tanks a lot. Pres shares stage with Army tanks as he prepares to address workers at the Lima Army Tank Plant in Ohio. Like his campaign rallies, he takes stage as loudspeaker blares "God Bless The USA." "Well, you better love me, I kept this place open," he tells plant workers.
author: markknoller

text: At the Lima Army Tank Plant, Pres Trump sees a tank under construction and confers with workers. "We kept it open," he says of the defense budget hike that kept the plant from closing.
author: markknoller

text: Pres Trump arrives in Lima, Ohio. Shakes hands with crowd of supporters on tarmac, before motorcading to the Lima Army Tank Plant for tour and speech.
author: markknoller

text: Pres Trump says it'll be up to Atty Gen Barr to decide if the Mueller report is made public. At the same time, he says "let it come out, let people see it." He says Mueller is "conflicted" and "his best friend is Comey, who's a bad cop." "Now let's see whether or not it's legit."
author: markknoller

text: Earlier, Schumer renewed proposal to honor John McCain by naming a Senate office building in his honor.
author: markknoller

text: McConnell clearly distances himself from Pres Trump's criticism of the late Sen. John McCain, McConnell tweets high praise for him.
author: markknoller

text: Air Force One (today a 757) is wheels up from Andrews en route Lima, Ohio (Lima as in bean, not Peru) to visit the US Army Tank Plant, which he says his increases in the defense budget saved from elimination.
author: markknoller

text: Pres Trump defends his use of @Twitter and other social media. He says his followers total 100-million. He says its the way he gets his word out in spite of "a  fake and corrupt media.”
author: markknoller

text: Pres arrives at @Andrews_JBA via Marine One, and is escorted to Air Force One by Col. Rebecca Sonkiss, Commander of he 89th Airlift Wing, the presidential fleet.
author: markknoller

text: Asked about eliminating ISIS in Syria, Pres Trump pulls out two maps that show  ISIS sites in red on the day he was elected, and the bottom map shows only a tiny red spot for ISIS that he says will be "gone by tonight."
author: markknoller

text: In exchange with reporters while leaving the WH for his trip to Ohio, Pres Trump said he has no idea when the Mueller report will be released. Wants to see what the report says. Let's see if it's fair, he said.
author: markknoller

text: Pres Trump hosting @netanyahu fir talks at the WH next Monday and Tuesday. The WH announced the visit will include a dinner on Tuesday. Announcement comes as @SecPompeo is in Jerusalem meeting with the Prime Minister.
author: markknoller

text: In his first tweet of the day, Pres still fuming and firiing back at criticism from a senior aide's husband.
author: markknoller

text: Pres Trump heads to Ohio today, a state indispensable to his re-election bid. Will be his 10th visit to Ohio since taking office. In Lima, he'll visit the Army Tank Plant and address personnel on his proposed defense budget hike. Heads to Canton later for a campaign fundraiser.
author: markknoller

text: .@SecPompeo bids farewell to Kuwaiti officials as he and wife Susan board plane en route 2nd stop on his Mideast swing, Israel.
author: markknoller

text: On @CBSThisMorning, @MajorCBS has first interview with @EPAAWheeler since his confirmation. He says the “biggest environmental threat” facing the world is unsafe water, not climate change.  Says most of the threats from climate change at least “50 to 75 years out.”
author: markknoller

text: Pres Trump was up past midnight posting last tweet of the day, slamming Dems for voting and election proposals.
author: markknoller

text: Join me in wishing a belated Happy Anniversary to @cspan, yesterday marking its 40th year providing live coverage of Congress and other news events, an invaluable national service. And hearty thanks and congrats to founder Brian Lamb. Great website too. https://www.c-span.org/
author: markknoller

text: Romney baffled by @POTUS latest slam today at the late Sen. John McCain.
author: markknoller

text: Leading the network evening newscasts tonight: CBS: Texas chemical fire still raging; ABC: Deadly charter bus crash; NBC: Prosecutor offers plea deal to Bob Kraft & others in soliciting prostitution case.
author: markknoller

text: On Wednesday, Pres Trump heads to Ohio to visit the Army Tank Plant in Lima. He also has political events scheduled later in the day.
author: markknoller

text: Pres Trump to host US-Caribbean summit at his Mar-a-Lago resort Friday with the leaders of the Bahamas, Dominican Republic, Haiti, Jamaica and Saint Lucia. WH says @POTUS will thank them for support on Venezuela, and to counter "China's predatory economic practices."
author: markknoller

text: Pres Trump announces intent to nominate retired @Delta executive Stephen Dickson to 5-year term as FAA Administrator. He is a former airline pilot, having flown A320s, B727s, B737s, B757s and B767s. In the USAF, he flew F-15s. He's a graduate of the US Air Force Academy.
author: markknoller

text: Pres Trump waves goodbye as Pres Bolsonaro of Brazil departs the WH. Pres said the US and Brazil are united by shared values and the relationship is better than ever and will become even stronger.
author: markknoller

text: In response to a question, Pres Trump makes clear he opposes the idea of expanding the number of justices on the Supreme Court. "We would have no interest in that whatsoever." He says Democrats are just trying "to catch up." Guarantees it won't happen for 6 years.
author: markknoller

text: Pres Trump again calls on the military in Venezuela to end its support for the Maduro regime, which he said is really "a Cuban puppet."
author: markknoller

text: Citing the situation in Venezuela, Pres Trump says "the twilight hour of socialism has arrived in our hemisphere," and in the U.S., he says. In a veiled reference to some Democratic politicians and proposals, he says "the last thing we want in the US is socialism.”
author: markknoller

text: Pres Trump announces his designation of Brazil as a major non-NATO ally, and perhaps even a NATO ally. Said he would have to talk to other leaders about that. Says US wants to work with Brazil to combat terrorism, transnational crime and human trafficking.
author: markknoller

text: By my count, this will be Pres Trump's 34th joint news conference with a foreign leader. His 10th news conference in the Rose Garden.
author: markknoller

text: .@SecPompeo and wife Susan arrive in Kuwait, first stop on his Mideast trip that also includes stops in Israel and Lebanon. Pompeo clearly in good spirits on being greeted by Kuwaiti officials.
author: markknoller

text: Pres Trump says he'll be discussing situation in Venezuela wit Pres Bolsonaro. "All options are on the table," says @POTUS. Calls conditions in Venezuela a shame, citing death, destruction and hunger. "We'll be talking about that in great length," he said.
author: markknoller

text: Pres Trump and Pres Bolsonaro exchange jerseys from their national soccer teams. @POTUS calls Brazil a soccer power.
author: markknoller

text: Asked about his weekend tweets critical of the late Sen John McCain, Pres Trump said he's still very unhappy that McCain didn't vote to repeal and replace ObamaCare as he said he would. "I think that's disgraceful." "I was never a fan of John McCain and I never will be."
author: markknoller

text: In the Oval Office, Presidents Trump and Bolsonaro exchange greetings and also team jerseys from the US and Brazilian soccer teams.
author: markknoller

text: Pres Trump greets Pres Bolsonaro of Brazil on arrival at the WH for talks. They hold joint news conference at 145pm. Bolsonaro took office Jan 1.
author: markknoller

text: Military honor guard lines WH driveway for arrival of Pres Bolsonaro of Brazil.
author: markknoller

text: Seeking to strike another blow against the Maduro regime, @USTreasury announces sanctions against Venezuela gold mining operations and its President for illicit operations serving to prop up the Maduro regime.  Freezes assets in US jurisdiction and bars US transactions with it.
author: markknoller

text: Passing reporters in the WH driveway, @AmbJohnBolton would only comment on today's visit by Brazil's Pres Bolsonaro, calling it "a potentially historic opportunity to redirect relations between our two countries." Would take no other questions.
author: markknoller

text: This afternoon, Pres Trump takes part in a ceremonial swearing in for Neomi Rao, confirmed 53-46 last week to a seat on the D.C. Court of Appeals, filling the vacancy of Supreme Court Justice Brett Kavanaugh. She is a former law prof. and law clerk to Clarence Thomas. No press.
author: markknoller

text: Today at the WH: Pres Trump welcomes Brazil's new Pres Jair Bolsonaro to talks and a joint news conference. Bolsonaro is a far-right politician who describes himself as pro-American. He hailed the @CIA on a visit there yesterday. It's Trump's first meeting with a Brazilian leader
author: markknoller

text: WH announced last night Pres Trump is nominating Washington attorney Christopher Landau to be Ambassador to Mexico. His bio says he speaks fluent Spanish and graduated magna cum laude from Harvard Law in 1989. He was a  law clerk to Justices Antonin Scalia & Clarence Thomas.
author: markknoller

text: Tuesday at the WH: Pres Trump welcomes Brazil's new president Jair Bolsonaro to the WH for talks and a joint news conference. Bolsonaro took office Jan 1. A senior Administration official calls it "a historic remaking" of the US-Brazilian relationship.
author: markknoller

text: Leading the network evening newscasts: CBS: Midwest flooding; ABC/NBC: fire at Texas petrochemical plant outside Houston.
author: markknoller

text: As he signs his Greek Independence Day proclamation, members of his audience chant "four more years," just the kind of response political outreach of this kind is designed to elicit.
author: markknoller

text: With Archbishop Demetrios of the Greek Orthodox Archdiocese at his side, Pres Trump hails the contributions of Greek Americans.
author: markknoller

text: Pres Trump begins remarks at WH reception marking Greek Independence Day,  holding up familiar looking red and white cap with words in Greek that say "Make Greece Great Again." He flings it into the audience.
author: markknoller

text: Pres Trump tweets prayers and pledges of assistance to @IAGovernor and @govkristinoem in response to floods in their states.
author: markknoller

text: At start of meeting with DefSec Shanahan, Defense Minister Parly reiterates that France "is and will remain a good and faithful ally" of the US, and recognizes that the US "is a  cornerstone of European security."
author: markknoller

text: Acting DefSec Patrick Shanahan welcomes French Defense Minister Florence Parly to the Pentagon with full military honors including 19-gun salute and playing of the French and US national anthems.
author: markknoller

text: As required by law, @ODNIgov today disclosed that the total funding requested for National Intelligence in the president's FY2020 budget last week is $62.8-billion. That's up from $59.8-billion requested in FY2019 and $59.4-billion appropriated in FY2018.
author: markknoller

text: In the State Dining Room, @FLOTUS convenes Interagency Working Group on Youth Programs. Officials from 18 Federal Depts and Agencies including Cabinet Secretaries take part to coordinate their youth programs with her Be Best initiative.
author: markknoller

text: Conway defends President's multitude of tweets this weekend, saying he "absolutely believes" they're a direct way for him to communicate with the country. "I would think those in the business of transparency and accountability should appreciate that," she tells press gaggle.
author: markknoller

text: After a weekend posting 50 tweets, Pres Trump back on social medial this  morning with double tweet pressing for GM/UAW talks soonest to keep  Lordstown plant up and operating.
author: markknoller

text: By presidential proclamations, this is National Poison Prevention Week. In his statement, @POTUS says "tour Nation's opioid epidemic has only added to the number of unintentional poisoning deaths."
author: markknoller

text: Today at the WH: Pres Trump is briefed on the 2019 @WhiteHouseCEA Economic Report. He has lunch with the @VP. And this evening hosts a reception marking Greek Independence Day, the only event on his schedule open to press coverage at this writing.
author: markknoller

text: Network evening newscasts all leading with the shooting massacre at two mosques in New Zealand.
author: markknoller

text:
From text of veto message:
  "It is a dangerous resolution that would undermine United States sovereignty and threaten the lives and safety of countless Americans.  It is, therefore, my duty to return it to the House of Representatives without my approval."
author: markknoller

text: Announcing March 26 vote in the House to override @POTUS veto, @SpeakerPelosi again called the president's border Emergency a "lawless power grab." She slams his veto as another act to "defy the Constitution."
author: markknoller

text: In response to a press question, Pres Trump again said he put no pressure on any Republicans on how to vote on the Emergency resolution. Said he told them "to vote your heart." He said "we all knew there'd be a veto" and he's confident Congress won't have the votes to override.
author: markknoller

text: Pres Trump signs first veto. House schedules vote to override.
author: markknoller

text: Atty Gen Barr said the crisis of illegal immigration is "right on our doorstep." Barr tells @POTUS that his declaration of a National Emergency is "solidly grounded in law."
author: markknoller

text: At veto signing, Attorney General William Barr said the president's declaration of a National Emergency on the southern border was "clearly authorized under the law." Barr said it's "exactly the kind of emergency the president is permitted to address under the Emergencies Act."
author: markknoller

text: Pres Trump says he has "the duty" to veto the resolution terminating his National Emergency. Says he's very proud to do it. Also says he's proud of Republicans in the House and Senate who voted against the resolution.
author: markknoller

text: Pres Trump calls the resolution to block his border crisis National Emergency would put Americans "in very grave danger." He says the border crisis is "definitely a national emergency" and the vote to block it "was a vote against reality."
author: markknoller

text: Pres Trump signs veto statement and gives pen to an "angel mom." Pres says "we're building a lot of wall right now." (TV Pool photo by @TerryMoran)
author: markknoller

text: “Today I am vetoing this resolution. Congress has the freedom to pass this resolution and I have the duty to veto it," says @POTUS.
author: markknoller

text: On the resolution to block his National Emergency on border construction, Pres Trump calls it "dangerous" and "reckless." Insists US is suffering an invasion of illegal immigrants. “No where left to hold all of the people that we’re capturing.” he says in defense of his action.
author: markknoller

text: At start of veto signing in Oval Office, Pres first expresses US condolences to New Zealand in wake of shooting massacre. Says he promised Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern any US assistance as its goes through a terrible ordeal. (Pool photo by @Jduckham)
author: markknoller

text: Even before @POTUS casts veto, House plans on override vote.
author: markknoller

text: WH says @POTUS conferred about the Ethiopian Airlines crash in phone call with Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed. They exchanged condolences for loss of life. Statement says @POTUS "underscored" US commitment to work with Ethiopia to determine the cause of the crash.
author: markknoller

text: Before signing veto, Pres thanking GOP Senators who voted against resolution to terminate his border National Emergency.
author: markknoller

text: .@hogangidley45 describes @POTUS as "outraged and saddened" by the shooting massacre in New Zealand. He's expected to confer with NZ Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern this afternoon to offer condolences and US assistance. Will tell the PM "this cannot stand," said Gidley.
author: markknoller

text: WH invites @CBP personnel and "angel moms and dads" who lost children to criminals in the US illegally, to be present for @POTUS veto of bill to terminate his border National Emergency.
author: markknoller

text: Administration official says Pres Trump expected to veto the National Emergency resolution about 330pm this afternoon in the Oval Office. Will be his first veto as president.
author: markknoller

text: Pres Trump and @VP back at WH after 70-minutes at Pentagon for national security meeting.
author: markknoller

text: @ACLU slams @SecPompeo threat to deny visas to Intl Criminal Court investigators. Calls it "unprecedented attempt to skirt international accountability for well-documented war crimes." Likens it to "totalitarian practices" of "worst human rights abusers,"
author: markknoller

text: Pres Trump and @VP arrive at Pentagon for twice-postponed national security meeting.
author: markknoller

text: .@SecPompeo arrives at Pentagon for national security meeting with Pres Trump.
author: markknoller

text: Third part of president's triple tweet asserting no reason for a Special Counsel to have been appointed.
author: markknoller

text: Despite reported North Korean threat to resume nuclear and missile tests, @SecPompeo is hopeful negotiations for denuclearization can continue. He says Kim Jong Un made a commitment at Hanoi summit he would not resume nuclear or missile tests & US expects him to live up to that.
author: markknoller

text: .@SecPompeo warns International Criminal Court the US may impose visa restrictions on those investigating Americans or allies for their actions in Afghanistan. "Don't assume you'll get a visa," he serves notice on ICC.. Says US oversees its own.
author: markknoller

text: Asked about reports North Korea upset with US negotiations, may resume missile & nuclear tests, accusing him and @pompeo of hostility and mistrust, Bolton dismissed the accusation as "inaccurate." Says he's consulted with his South Korea counterpart & others about a US response.
author: markknoller

text: NSA @AmbJohnBolton says WH "gravely disturbed" by the shooting massacre in New Zealand. Said it seems to be a terror attack and hate crime. In touch with New Zealand to see if there's any role the US can play to assist in their response.
author: markknoller

text: Pres offers sympathies and "anything we can do" to New Zealand in wake of massacre.
author: markknoller

text: Pres Trump today scheduled to visit the Pentagon for a meeting with national security officials. This meeting was postponed a number of times over the past weeks. Pres also poised to cast his first veto against bill to terminate his border wall funding National Emergency.
author: markknoller

text: In written statement, WH "strongly condemns" massacre in New Zealand. From @PressSec: "Our thoughts and prayers are with the victims and their families. We stand in solidarity with the people of New Zealand and their government against this vicious act of hate.”
author: markknoller

text: WH/NSC says US "strongly supports" Israel's right of self-defense. Comes after Israel bombed Hamas sites in the Gaza Strip, which followed rockets launched at Tel Aviv from Gaza. @GMarquis45 says the rockets "make it impossible" for intl community to assist Palestinians in Gaza.
author: markknoller

text: At a St Patrick's Day reception in the East Room, Pres Trump receives a traditional Bowl of Shamrock from Taioseach Leo Varadkar. @POTUS noted it's a tradition that goes back to Pres Truman in 1952 and reflects Irish and American support for one another.
author: markknoller

text: .@SpeakerPelosi statement on Senate final passage disapproving @POTUS National Emergency declaration:   “This is not an emergency, and the Congress has declared in a strong bipartisan voice that the President’s fearmongering doesn’t make it one.”
author: markknoller

text: Pres tweets in response to Senate vote terminating his National Emergency:
author: markknoller

text:
12 Republicans joined 47 Democrats and Independents to block Pres Trump's National Emergency declaration:
 
  Alexander TN
  Blunt MO
  Collins ME
  Lee UT
  Moran KS
  Murkowski AK
  Paul KY
  Portman OH
  Romney UT
  Rubio FL
  Toomey PA
  Wicker MS
author: markknoller

text: Senate votes 59-41 final passage on bill to block Pres Trump's National Emergency declaration for southern border wall construction funding. @POTUS has said he will veto the measure and it will not be overridden.
author: markknoller

text: Senate now voting on bill to terminate the National Emergency declared by Pres Trump to obtain border wall construction funding. Democrats expect enough support from Republicans to pass the measure. Pres Trump has promised a veto and says it won't be overridden.
author: markknoller

text: And subway trains.
author: markknoller

text: Sad news about the eagle injured on the Metro tracks yesterday. https://www.facebook.com/CityWildlife/photos/a.246890095422980/1885029481609025/?type=3&theater …
author: markknoller

text: Friends of Ireland Luncheon ends and @SpeakerPelosi walks @POTUS down the Capitol steps to his limo. He will see the Taioseach again this evening at WH Bowl of Shamrock reception.
author: markknoller

text: The Taioseach presents @SpeakerPelosi with a framed copy of a message of support from members of Congress to Ireland in 1937, the year its Constitution took effect. The signers include Harry Truman and Richard Russell. Pelosi said she would display it with "great pride."
author: markknoller
